entry.def: Intolerance is unwillingness to let other people act in a different way or hold different opinions from you.

example.ex: ...his intolerance of any opinion other than his own.
example.tran: 他不能容忍自己观点以外的任何观点
宗教信仰上的不容异己

means.word_mean: 2. unwillingness to recognize and respect differences in opinions or beliefs
